title: NonAggregate modifications broke code that doesn't touch aggregation
body:
We have implemented the following for setting a `Nullable<Timestamptz>` to either null or now dynamically (about 5 months ago):

```rust
#[cfg(feature = "with_chrono")]
pub fn optional_now(
	is_not_null: bool,
) -> Box<
	dyn diesel::BoxableExpression<
		(),
		diesel::pg::Pg,
		SqlType = diesel::sql_types::Nullable<diesel::sql_types::Timestamptz>,
	>,
> {
	use chrono::{DateTime, Utc};
	use diesel::{
		dsl::now,
		prelude::*,
		sql_types::{Nullable, Timestamptz},
	};
	if is_not_null {
		Box::new(now.into_sql::<Nullable<Timestamptz>>())
	} else {
		// There doesn't seem to be an expression that always represents null
		Box::new(Option::<DateTime<Utc>>::None.into_sql::<Nullable<Timestamptz>>())
	}
}
```

This broke as of be0854094c79ae99ba3c893242a4be358ac0b0c5, giving the following error:
```
   --> lib.rs:150:3
    |
150 |         Box::new(now.into_sql::<Nullable<Timestamptz>>())
    |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ expected struct `diesel::expression::is_aggregate::No`, found struct `diesel::expression::is_aggregate::Never`
    |
    = note: required for the cast to the object type `dyn diesel::expression::BoxableExpression<(), diesel::pg::backend::Pg, SqlType = diesel::sql_types::Nullable<diesel::pg::types::sql_types::Timestamptz>, IsAggregate = diesel::expression::is_aggregate::No>`

error[E0271]: type mismatch resolving `<diesel::expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Nullable<diesel::pg::types::sql_types::Timestamptz>, std::option::Option<chrono::datetime::DateTime<chrono::offset::utc::Utc>>> as diesel::expression::ValidGrouping<()>>::IsAggregate == diesel::expression::is_aggregate::No`
   --> lib.rs:153:3
    |
153 |         Box::new(Option::<DateTime<Utc>>::None.into_sql::<Nullable<Timestamptz>>())
    |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ expected struct `diesel::expression::is_aggregate::No`, found struct `diesel::expression::is_aggregate::Never`
    |
    = note: required for the cast to the object type `dyn diesel::expression::BoxableExpression<(), diesel::pg::backend::Pg, SqlType = diesel::sql_types::Nullable<diesel::pg::types::sql_types::Timestamptz>, IsAggregate = diesel::expression::is_aggregate::No>`
```

From what I understand, this is not expected breakage as described in #2251.

(By the way if this could instead work with just `Option<now>` that would be much better ^^)
